snippet.title: Tamagotchi Friends Digital Friend TV Commercial
snippet.description: Raise your very own Tamagotchi Friends character from egg to an adult with the Tamagotchi Friends Digital Friend available at ToysRUs.  This fun, interactive virtual friend will grow and develop differently depending on how well you take care of it. Once your Tamagotchi egg has hatched, feed it food when it is hungry, give it medicine when it is sick, potty train it, bathe it and play games to earn Gotchi points. And for the first time, you can “bump” with other Tamagotchis to send text messages, send gifts and even go on a playdate! The more you “bump” the more points and rewards you will earn and the higher your best friend meter will go. Then use your points to buy meals, snacks and jewelry in the shop or share items with your friends by giving and receiving gifts.
